alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 10:42AM EST until March 14 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. .The river will be within a foot of flood stage early this week, then rise above flood stage again Wednesday, and continue rising to a crest of 19.0 feet on Friday. For the Patoka River...including Princeton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING CONTINUES THROUGH MONDAY, MARCH 14TH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...Until Monday, March 14th. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Sunday the stage was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will be just below flood stage, then rise above flood stage again early Wednesday morning to a crest of 19.0 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage the following Monday, March 14th. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
